tonight is ANNAS UNGROUNDING PARTY/HOT TUB PARTY!
where-my house
time-8ish 
bring all your friends and a bathing suit!

soo yeah anna is about to come over so we can invite more people/ get some munchies for tonight. and yeah it will be awesome b/c the only way to celebrate anna getting ungrounded is to throw a massive party. i love yall. comment if you need directions or are coming or just call me or anna. -krista
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/11380.html

wow its been a long ass time since i updated. like 2 monthes almost. haha well anyways summer has been pretty good. since i last updated some good and bad things about summer / end of the school year.

+++++++schools out
+hanging out with sarah....a lot!
+getting to room with alice at dance team camp
+dance team camp..even though it was hard 
+seeing my cousins
+annalisa's fun wedding even if it was raining some
+my last hot tub party before the end of the year
+meeting a ton of cool new people
+going bowling until 2 o clock
+going shopping
+playing hooky at dance today
+lake visits
+leaving for vegas in 2 days
+anna getting ungrounded! 
+daddys day and my daddys birthday
+late nights with my girls
+being able to wear WHATEVER I WANT. no stupid dress code.
+getting best friend bracelets at gas stations
+seeing friends i havent seen in way too long
+++sno biz visits..maybe even 2 times in one day..yeah they think im crazy


-dance 
-dance team practice
-getting screwed over
-not seeing people on vacation at the beach and new york while your stuck at home dancing
-getting an 89 in chemistry..come on doris give me a point. gah
-missing my little cousins recital..again..thanks dance team camp
-being tired
-my mom waking me up...marilyn come on


well it has been a pretty awesome summer. and im looking forward to the rest of it. soo yeah. and...
ANNA'S AND OTHERS UNGROUNDING PARTY AT MY HOUSE JUNE 29 OR 30 WHATEVER IS BETTER FOR EVERYONE. ALL IS INVITED AND BRING YOUR BATHING SUIT/TOWEL FOR THE HOT TUB..we will see how many people we can fit in there and i bet its more than 8. soo call me or anna or montana or someone if you wanna come. but its really easy to find my house and yeah be excited. lol ok im about to go shopping for a skirt! yay i love summer. mk i love yall. krista.
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/11133.html

i havent updated in a loooong time. and i want to go to sleep sooo goodnight everyone. love you krista.

& hot tub party friday night at my house after the soccer game soo come if you want to.

hmmm i hate school and really dont want to go tomorrow! well i had a good weekend except when mayonaisse or however u spell it got all over me at the baseball game...yeah that wasnt too cool!! and i have been really lazy today! haha well i was just bored and decided to update even though i have nothing to say soo bye yall. krista.
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/10522.html

well we have try outs tomorrow and it sucks at 830 in the am...which sucks more and its making me stressed which i hate! soooo altogether try outs suck! but on a positive note it is friday and this try out nonsense will be over tomorrow at about 10!! i hope everyone has a good weekend im guna go get some ice cream!! yay
love u. krista
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/10448.html

monday. back at school and back to all the drama. uhh i had sooo much fun on spring break hangin out at auburn and at the beach and with my awesome friends!! doing crazy things and sleeping in till like one thirty! gah well today definately has had a lot of drama..starting dance team clinic and mrs wilson quitting that was quite a surprise! and ooo man im guna miss her! she was really awesome and even if she was only guna do majorettes we would still get to see her but now who knows! well anyways only like 8 more weeks of school! well im bored and eating some yummy strawberry pie and i hope everyone has a nice day because i have to go take peektures at dance! well i love u. krista
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/10023.html

well i have had a fun weekend..my hot cousin molly was in town! heck yes!! we stayed up till about 4 every morning talking and watching movies. ooo man! we went shopping and tanning got really burnt on our backs and my battery in my car died...and so my daddy was like what we just got this car and u like left the lights on or something...but no the water ran out sooo he apologized for saying it was my fault. ooo man 5 days until SPRING BREAK '05!! yay im super excited first im going to auburn with anna to stay with her brother clay mac!! yall gimme a call! then im going to the beach with liz sooo yeah its guna be fun! i dont know what beach we are going to but give me a call if you are guna be down there!!! mk well im going to bed! oo & i want to wish miss nicole a happy 16th birthday!!! wow im going to bed at like 9 i havent done this since like 5th grade haha!! well bye yall! leave a comment.
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/9919.html

hey... my name is krista. right now- im at alices house, and were havin a rockin party. dont be jealous. i know that im the coolest person in the world and that you all love me, like, whoa. but i really need you to stop. bc i have like 5623890753 boyfriends and theyre all getting really jealous of the amt of friends that i have. i just dropped this great cd that alice, the next coolest person ever made me, and i hope its not broken. ((Wigger-Vol.II)). its a good one, oh yea. sooo, i saw alices puppy. shes pretty dang cute. we went to the tanning bed today. were practically black- were so tan. yea- once again, dont be jealous. i know you think im black already- but now im even blacker. i just gave alice my used heart sticker from the tanning bed. its all crumpled up- and i dropped it on her floor. 


ps alice wrote this!!!....maybe..
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/9486.html

well today is the last day in january and it has started out the new year right...
good things that happened in january!
+GOT A CAR!!!
+won uda kick and best choreography
+my solo got first at uda state and 2nd at american all star state 
+we won kick and got 2nd at american all star state
+my birthday is in like 4 days
+gotten really close to some people for example montenegro
+hung out with a lot of really cool people such as liz laura and most all of the dance team at one point or another

bad things
-stupid dance team drama
-school has been boring
-not enough sleep
anyways tonight i have like NO homework and its freakin awesome im sooo excited about the week/weekend to come!! only 2 days of dance team!! going out to eat for my bday on thursday night with the parentals/grandparents!! friday...hopefully getting my license and doing something spectacular that night!! saturday is my bday party...everyone should come at like 7 till whenever everybody leaves!! yay i love this!! im soo excited! mk bye yall!!! love u krista.
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/9328.html

ok s o this is montana. today was great. krista was a fox on stage, 1st place solo i mite add. annndd best choreography for both the kick we on bestmade up!!and to top it all off, we won kick in the state....yessss. so we havin , um alloott of fun.....no comment on that by the way.and eating cookie dough.so we're gonna watch animal house, and jeff isnt comin. so have a good day on that note.

EDIT: thebest day`EVER!!!!
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/8984.html

omgah yall i am actually updating!! mk soo this week has been super good because
-8 days till i turn 16
-9 days till my bday bash
-i got a SUPER AWESOME CAR
-suprised with a car by the parentals/dance team
-had pretty decent grades on the old progress report
-didnt have dance like at all b/c they have a comp. that i cant go to
sooo yeah good week..but next week should be better...b/c it will be my bday!! yeah well soo this weekend we have UDA competition soo that should be fun..well we will see how it goes! mk sooo i think we got our upstairs computer fixed which is good..now i can u that one! but yeah i absolutely love my new baby..comment if u have an idea for its name...or comment if u love me!! haha well im going to get some ice cream and such. love u krista.
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/8867.html

i hate stupid projects given over christmas break..especially ones that require reading. gah stupidness.

well dance team practice today wasnt all that bad! our set is now at the school and it looks totally kick ass. man go daddys that built it! yayuh! 

-omgah i do not want to back to school tomorrow!!! ahhh but at least we didnt have to go back today like hoover and such which was kinda good it was one more day i mean..this semester is going to suck major ass tho. we have like no breaks except for spring break which will be totally awesome esp. if my mommy lets me spend it with anna or emily in auburn! yay! that would be fun..mk well im bored and i have to finish my stupid english project! ahhh! well luv u. krista
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/8412.html

HAPPY NEW YEARS EVERYBODY!!!! its 2005 and about time!! i mean last year was fun and all but i just hope this year will be a lot better!! so far its been fun i hung out with anna leah ashlen and miss joanna last night and that was lots of fun!! made one too many prank phone calls and had people dressing up as ballerinas.. wow crazyiness!! i had a few people tell me they loved me..lol and wow this year is guna be awesome i hope well at least i will be able to drive!!yay well hope everyone had a good new year!! love yall krista

mk yall im really really bored....so yeah i did a fun lil survey thingie...yes! 

Basics

Straight/Gay/Bi: straight
Single? yupp
If not, do you want to be?
Birthdate: feb. 4 1989
Your age: 15
Age you act: most of the time i think i act my age..

well tonight me and alice went to the bball game and met up with jen and emily and joanna but she didnt hang out with us lata..gah loser!! haha and whoa it was close we were sweating it..but we won and thats all that matters!! hah yeah soo afterwards we went to rachels and allisons bday party!! yeah yuh!! we missed the turn at first and alice was getting pretty upset b/c we were all like alice turn here no here! so yeah good times! we stayed there for a lil while then went to emilys to pick up grapefruit for the parents then back to my house for some pinball darts bballs and the jams! haha yes!!!!!!!! molly and annalisa are coming ova tomorrow..yay!!!!!!!!!!! we are having a party for molly tomorrow night! and stayin up all night to watch movies and such! well im going to bed b/c i will be up all night tomorrow so i need some rest! talk to u kids lata and have a good holiday! kisses krista.

im talkin to my sexy cousins molly and rosie at the moment! yeah they are coming down to visit me on saturday yay!!! and they get to stay til tues or wed. sooo i have to go tomorrow for dance team practice how stupid is that i mean come on!!! i know we need it but i really dont want to go but i will just think im out of school in like 3 days!!! uhhh i am really bored soo im guna go. bye kids!! luv u krista

well friday night i had the dance team/majorette party at my house till about 5ish.. then monty and anna mac  stayed and we hung out/got ready for the basketball game! that was way fun and we kicked spain parks ass..not really but we still won..me and anna mac took off our tops. LoL just our jackets! but when they dropped me off my parents friends from the office were still here so i had to hear about how much i have grown up omg..get over it! im soo tall..shut up old people! but saturday i woke up at 530 to go shopping at six o clock in the morning!!!! ahh it was pyscho crazyiness but i got a bunch of my christmas shopping done and it was all on sale..yeah yuh! then i slept all afternoon and chatted with molly and such. sunday i was very lazy but i showered and went shopping with my madre for christmas stuff we got a bunch of stuff for my daddy! yeah soo now im guna go eat and watch a movie and be lazy and not do any of those stupid review packets uhh i dislike school. but i only have to take my dance uhhh stupidness and spanish exams..i might take math to raise my grade but who knows..soo talk to u kids lata! luv u much krista.
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/6811.html

yeah well im actually updating believe it or not!! but yeah im bored and supposed to be studying but o                  well! yeah soo i had a christmas show last weekend and im still really tired from that but anyways the dance team christmas party is on friday! so yeah and HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ANNA LEIGH MAC!!!! yes that beautiful girl is 17 today! soo anyways im havin a party sometime in the near future or something sooo call if u want to come and im really really bored if yall couldnt tell but im going to attempt to study now and only like 3 more days of actual school till christmas break soo yay!!! mk bye kids! luv u krista
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/6636.html

well yesterday i went to help out at alexs bday bash with casie! yeah that was fun i went shopping and we spent the night at the wynfry so me and casie got without a paddle...holy crap funny funny movie!!!and well we went to sleep at about 1:30 while the 15 little children stayed up till about 5..haha sucks for them. but today i came home and attempted to work on my research paper...but i didnt..gah i really need to do that! but we had dance team from 2 till 5 to learn the jazz dance..wow let me tell you its a fun dance..and im being extremely sarcastic if you could not tell! wow umm lets just say if we have to do that..i quit! yes well im going to go eat or something! gosh i cant believe we have school tomorrow that sucks!! ahh ok bye kids! luv u much krista.
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/6358.html

ok well fall break has had ups and downs..its been boring and exciting mostly boring but yeah. my cousins came to visit me the first weekend...total awesomeness! but yeah i went shopping and got my hair cut and spend the night parties..have to go to dance team practice tomorrow from 10-12..gah that sucks. but nicole might come spend the afternoon with me and watch some of our all time favorite movies and prolly have a chat seeing as we havent hung out since like friday..gah way too long!! haha..well i love that i update this once a month soo i highly doubt anyone reads this but if someone would like to make my journal prettyful..contact me and i would greatly appreciate it and i really dont want to go to the football game tomorrow.. i mean we are guna lose anyways..why does it matter? no one knows. so yesterday jenny and lauren and emily spent the night we stayed up till like 3 and i had to get my hair done soo i had to wake up at 8..why i dont know. but anyways..i got a air hockey table..we gettin our pinball machines back soon so party.. and major big butt party when i get my hot tub..yeah yuh! ok well im bored so going to find something to do!! luv u. krista
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/6052.html

hello my good friends. guess what...ok i will tell u me and my chum nicole are really cool with about a billion inside jokes sooo yes end of story. well dance team today wasnt that that bad...ok it wasnt good eitha but yes. umm i have dance later on but no homework..soo yes!! im hungry i dont see how anyone could have an eating disorder maybe i just love food that much. well yes alice makes me happy...bahaha tommy pickles!!!!!!!!!!!! that was great.. really funny stuff u should of been there. wednesday night dude me and my girls partyed heck yes. we are talking get down and dirty.! we are terrific dancers. by the way if no one knew today was everyone look cute except krista day. yeah thats right jenny wit her new fanstatic shirt..she looked hot. and oo emily. who by the way is going to take me with her to an auburn game looked hot..oo ok everyone did.! ok im hungry.. guna go eat.! luv u..krista
comment if u soo wish!! <3
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/5694.html

hello all.. i will be very surprised if anyone actually reads this because i havent updated since june!! but yeah im really really bored. i had a girls night on wednesday on account of ivan coming and no dance/ or school.!and thursday i had no power.. it sucked i slept all day. friday nicole spent the night. heck yes. we took a walk and i almost ran into a mailbox but nicole saved me...luckily.! and warrrrrrrrrrrrrr eagle.! heck yes auburn beat lsu. in ur face!!!i fell asleep during it though..oo well it was halftime. i think. but yeah right now me and miss christie are having a heart to heart then im going to bed. 15 days till my hot sexy older cousin molly comes to town.! everyone watch out. and yeah i need to study/ do my homework from wednesday. so yeah. luv u krista.:.
http://lilmiss-kris.livejournal.com/5567.html

well i is goin 2 tha lake 2day sooner or lata! we are goin 2 have a partay for my wonderful daddy because it is fathers day and my uncle 2!! yay! then me and brittany guna watch movies and play on tha computer games b/c she called me last nite at tha mall 2 tell me 2 bring them! and 2 tell me in her swim meet she got 3 blue ribbons and 2 red ribbons! she is really good for a 7 year old!! anyways when we were at tha mall shoppin for my daddy day present i jus happened 2 go into tha disney store and i got some beach towels and a cinderella ballet doll and a tshirt then i asked when cinderella came out on dvd and they said next fall so yay! but im sure they thought i was crazy but who cares cinderella is the coolest princess eva!! well  i gots 2 go pack for tha lake but everyone have a safe and wonderful weekend and a good daddys day!! luv u~ *krista*
